# templateRpackage

A template for R packages.

## Installation

You can install `templateRpackage` using:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("derecksprojects/templateRpackage")
```

Or from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("templateRpackage")
```

## License

This project is licensed under the MIT License.

# Package index

## R Functions

Pure R functions

- [`add()`](https://derecksprojects.github.io/templateRpackage/reference/add.md)
  : Add two numbers

## Rcpp Functions

High-performance C++ functions

- [`sum_array_cpp()`](https://derecksprojects.github.io/templateRpackage/reference/sum_array_cpp.md)
  : Sum a numeric vector using loop unrolling
